title: System Design Basics Quiz
description: Reinforce core system design pillars and process.

questions.question: Scalability focuses on:
options: Handling growth in users and traffic
questions.explanation: Scalability is about sustaining performance under growth.

questions.question: Availability means the system:
options: Stays up and usable despite failures
Stores data in one region only
questions.explanation: Availability targets uptime and continued service access.

questions.question: Which is a common system component?
questions.explanation: Load balancers are standard for traffic distribution.

questions.question: A strong interview sequence starts by:
questions.explanation: Requirements and scale assumptions shape all later decisions.
